triples.name: Philosophy of psychology
triples.relevance: The paper draws on philosophy of psychological explanation to frame its theoretical approach.

triples.name: Level of analysis
triples.relevance: Marr's levels-of-analysis framework is central to the paper's discussion of psychological explanation.

triples.name: Cognitive psychology
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates the success of Marr's framework in cognitive psychology and seeks to extend it.

triples.name: Social psychology
triples.relevance: The paper proposes extending Marr's framework to social psychology as an additional area of application.

triples.name: Developmental psychology
triples.relevance: The paper proposes extending Marr's framework to developmental psychology.

triples.name: Evolutionary psychology
triples.relevance: The paper proposes extending Marr's framework to evolutionary psychology.

triples.name: Scientific theory
triples.relevance: The paper addresses how to build high-verisimilitude explanatory theories before empirical testing.

triples.name: Psychology
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on improving psychological science by understanding capacities rather than just effects.

triples.name: Theory
triples.relevance: The paper proposes the theoretical cycle as a novel method for building high-verisimilitude explanatory theories before empirical testing.
